alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Jones; Monroe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 9:15AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Monroe, northwestern Jones and southern Jasper Counties through 945 AM EDT... At 915 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Forsyth, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Bradley, Wayside, Hillsboro, Berner, Round Oak, Juliette, Adgateville, Plant Scherer and Jarrell Plantation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EDT for central Georgia.
